remarks: The composition of a 1-1 function with a finitely supported function is finitely supported.  (Contributed by AV, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
fsuppco.f $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp Z ) $.
fsuppco.g $e |- ( ph -> G : X -1-1-> Y ) $.
fsuppco.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. W ) $.
fsuppco.v $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
fsuppco $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. G ) finSupp Z ) $.
